article_title: GOP Senator: I've Got a Real Problem with Obama Not Being Honest with American Public
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER





Monday on WSAU in Wausau,WI, Sen. Ron Johnson (R-WI) said, he has “a real problem,” with President Barack Obama “not being forthright with the American public” about the real danger of ISIS and what it will take to fight them.

Johnson said, “You have to be honest with the American public — we already have American combat personnel in Iraq. And there are going to be involved in the fight. My guess is they are already on some of the front lines and exposed to danger. They are not all sitting at the green zone .”

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“The American President must be honest with the American people. He must be honest with our allies and potential coalition partners, and he’s got to show a 100 percent commitment or there is no chance for success.”

Follow Pam Key on Twitter @pamkeyNEN
